body_html:
@dustinvtran that sounds like a good idea thanks for getting back to us. I will talk to the other devs. I suppose another option would be to talk at NIPS. @awav is the one who nicely duked it out through all the "pain points". Suspect other devs will be keen too.
I also keep finding Hamiltonian AIS extremely useful in my non GP work. It should be used more.
